title: Introduction to the Book of Mormon
description: Group read and discussion on 1 Nephi 1–3, focusing on faith and obedience.
speaker: Sister Allen

title: Guest Speaker: Returned Missionary
description: Brother Jimenez shared his experience serving in Argentina and how it strengthened his testimony.
speaker: Brother Jimenez

title: Scripture Journaling Workshop
description: We explored how to deepen our study through journaling insights from the Book of Mormon.
speaker: Sister Green

title: Respecting Other Faiths
description: Discussion on Articles of Faith #11 and how to show kindness to people of other religions.
speaker: Brother Park

title: General Conference Preview
description: We reviewed the purpose of General Conference and shared what talks we are looking forward to.
speaker: Group Discussion

title: Testimony Night
description: Open floor for members to share their personal testimonies and experiences with the gospel.
speaker: Various Members

title: Service Planning
description: We planned a group activity to visit and help elderly members of the ward with spring cleaning.
speaker: Brother Juárez

title: Doctrine & Covenants Quiz
description: Fun quiz night focused on D&C teachings; prizes included church-themed bookmarks.
speaker: Sister Perez

title: Faith and Mental Health
description: Discussion about how faith and prayer can help with anxiety, depression, and self-worth.
speaker: Sister Ramirez

title: Activity Night: Board Games & Scriptures
description: We combined fun with learning by playing scripture-based trivia and clean games.
speaker: Activity Committee

title: Temple Preparation Class
description: Introduction to temple covenants and why temples are sacred places.
speaker: Brother White

title: Fast Testimonies & Pizza
description: We shared short testimonies and enjoyed a simple meal afterward.
speaker: Various Members

title: Family History Workshop
description: We learned to use FamilySearch.org and talked about the spirit of Elijah.
speaker: Sister Kim

title: Q&A with the Bishop
description: Bishop López joined us for a casual Q&A about preparing for missions and staying strong spiritually.
speaker: Bishop López

title: Scripture Mastery Challenge
description: Participants recited memorized scriptures and shared their personal meaning.
speaker: Youth Leaders
